      • testSetUpGameBeforeRegisterPlayer

        public void testSetUpGameBeforeRegisterPlayer()
        Tests the behaviour of setUpGame() if the player wasn't already registered. (if update() in Controller receives a SelectDifficulty message before a player was registered.
        See Also:
        SinglePlayerController.setUpGame(ViewMessage)

      • testFirstWrongSetUpGame

        public void testFirstWrongSetUpGame()
        Tests the method setUpGame() when the difficulty selected is valid.

        Nothing should be done to the game and an error should be shown.

        When the next SelectDifficulty message is receive, if the difficulty is allowed, the set up must be completed.

        (First branch of the condition)

        See Also:
        SinglePlayerController.setUpGame(ViewMessage)

      • testSecondWrongSetUpGame

        public void testSecondWrongSetUpGame()
        Tests the method setUpGame() when the difficulty selected is valid.

        Nothing should be done to the game and an error should be shown.

        (Second branch of the condition)

        See Also:
        SinglePlayerController.setUpGame(ViewMessage)
